          <title>
            <string language="en">Half life of a radioactive element</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbwertzeit eines radioaktiven Elements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demi vie d'un élément radioactif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meia vida de um elemento radioativo</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Media vida de un elemento radiactivo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the breakdown of an radioactive element and visualizes its half life.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

          </description>

          </description>
